channel.title: Other people have trouble logging in
channel.description:
Hello again Moparscape, I have been notified lately by people who use my server telling me that they're having trouble logging in to play, they can log in but as soon as they see the "Loading-please wait..." it freezesand it stays there for ever until they close the clientsomething seems to be going wrong, but I'm running the Ip and there are no errors, can someone help me please.. One million Thank you's :)
~Zofis

item.title: Other people have trouble logging in
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

hmm I might go with your first idea but I don’t understand, It worked before. Me and other people could log in and if it helps to know, I’m using richscape 503, thats what it looks like anyway a 503 maybe its a 317 idk ??

Read full topic
item.source: Other people have trouble logging in

item.title: Other people have trouble logging in
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

swift thats not it…

try using a different source, urs is screwed up beyond repair…

this rarely happens 2 me, thats y u shuld backup ur work lol then do updates, etc

and if thats not it, idk maybe its ur login method checking to c if its from localhost connecting, making u only 1 able to connect, and it disconects any1 else

xD idk im not that smart, but my suggestion is just make new server

Read full topic
